ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: ... LOL...Well i do just happen to be one of those cute Wood Elf Druids and if you have a really bad video card I am even naked so flirting might work :-) ::
ygData.messageBody:
--- bigmaca3 <bigmaca3@...> wrote:
> And, since I assume you are one of those cute little
> Wood Elf Druids
> just flirt a little and all those big Warriors will
> fall all over
> themselves to help you out! I know I would! LOL
>
> Good Hunting
> Tuldayen Grimblade
> Ranger of Tunare, Terris-Thule
>
>
LOL...Well i do just happen to be one of those cute
Wood Elf Druids and if you have a really "bad" video
card I am even naked so flirting might work :-) ::
giggling, Amaiya peeks over the fence into
Terris-Thule:::

Thank you very much for the information. It is most
helpful and since I don't have to work tomorrow I can
stay up tonight and work on upgrading my weapon
somehow <impish grin>

Amaiya,the Evercurious (and sometimes silly)
Flirtatious Druid of Ayonae Ro
